```{r}
#Zustandsfunktion, WICHTIG: <00001| enspricht hier 10000
zufu <- function(N){
  l <- rep(list(0:1), N)
  expand.grid(l)
}

#Sigma_z_i; Spalten = N, Zeilen = N^2
sigm_zi <- function(mat, N, i){
  mat[i] <- -mat[i]
  mat
}

#Sigma_x_i; 
sigma_xi <- function(mat, N, i){
  for (a in c(1:(2^N-1))){
    for (b in c((a+1):2^N)){
      tmp <- mat[a,] - mat[b,]
      if (sqrt(sum(tmp^2)) == 1 && unlist(unname(abs(tmp[i]))) == 1){
        tmp2 <- mat[b,]
        mat[b,] <- mat[a,]
        mat[a,] <- tmp2
      }
    }
  }
  mat
}






N <- 4
mat <- zufu(N)

mat1 <- sigma_xi(mat, N, 1)
mat2 <- sigma_xi(mat1, N ,2)
mat2
```
